string.text: {HERO} overruled the will of the council of {FACTION}
{MOTHER.LINK} has given birth to a healthy baby.
{COMMON_AREA} in {SETTLEMENT} is now cleared of thugs.
{TOWN_NAME} has been besieged by forces led by {LORD.LINK} of the {FACTION_NAME}!
{INSULTER.LINK} says {INSULTEE.LINK} is extorting money from enterprises.
{INSULTER.LINK} says {INSULTEE.LINK} hoards goods to drive up prices.
{MOTHER.LINK} has given birth, but the child was stillborn.
{TOWN_NAME} has been besieged by the army led by {LORD.LINK} of the {FACTION_NAME}!
The {CLAN} have contracted to fight alongside the {KINGDOM}.
{CLAIMANT.LINK} says that {SETTLEMENT_NAME} should be owned by the {CLAIMANT_CLAN}, not the {CURRENT_OWNER_CLAN}.
The {FACTION1} and the {FACTION2} have made peace.
{RULER_NAME} of the {FACTION1_NAME} declares war on the {FACTION2_NAME}
{HERO_1.LINK} is responsible for the death of {HERO_2.LINK}
{INSULTER.LINK} has said {INSULTEE.LINK} caused a battlefield setback by acting in a cowardly fashion.
{INSULTER.LINK} has quarrelled with {INSULTEE.LINK} over a courtship.
{TOWN_NAME} has been besieged by army led by {LORD.LINK} of the {FACTION_NAME}!
{INSULTER.LINK} has said {INSULTEE.LINK} caused a setback on the battlefield by failing to follow orders.
{SETTLEMENT} is raided by the army led by {LORD.LINK} of the {FACTION_NAME}
{INSULTER.LINK} has accused {INSULTEE.LINK} of stirring up trouble among the people.
{INSULTER.LINK} claims {INSULTEE.LINK} has been trying to fraudulently acquire land.
{INSULTER.LINK} has quarreled with {INSULTEE.LINK} over a fief.
The {FACTION1} and the {FACTION2} have made peace
{INSULTER.LINK} has said {INSULTEE.LINK} caused a setback on the battlefield by behaving rashly.
{HERO_1} is responsible for the death of {HERO_2}
